code: import React from'react';import{Row,Col}from'antd';import{calculateStats}from'../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatsCards=_ref=>{let{stocks,loading=false}=_ref;const stats=calculateStats(stocks);const cards=[{title:'ÂÖ≥Ê≥®ËÇ°Á•®ÊÄªÊï∞',icon:'üìä',iconClass:'icon-chart',value:stats.totalCount,subtitle:`ÂÖ±ÂÖ≥Ê≥® ${stats.totalCount} Âè™ËÇ°Á•®`,trend:'neutral'},{title:'Âπ≥ÂùáÂ∏ÇÁõàÁéá',icon:'‚ö°',iconClass:'icon-trend',value:stats.avgPE,subtitle:`ËæÉ‰∏äÊ¨° ${stats.avgPE<15?'‰º∞ÂÄºÂÅè‰Ωé':stats.avgPE>25?'‰º∞ÂÄºÂÅèÈ´ò':'‰º∞ÂÄºÂêàÁêÜ'}`,trend:stats.avgPE<15?'up':stats.avgPE>25?'down':'neutral'},{title:'‰ºòË¥®Ê†áÁöÑ',icon:'‚≠ê',iconClass:'icon-star',value:stats.qualityCount,subtitle:'PE < 15 & ROE > 15%',trend:stats.qualityCount>0?'up':'neutral'},{title:'ÊúÄÂêéÊõ¥Êñ∞',icon:'üîî',iconClass:'icon-bell',value:stats.lastUpdate,subtitle:new Date().toLocaleDateString('zh-CN'),trend:'neutral'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{gutter:[20,20],style:{marginBottom:32},children:cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,sm:12,md:6,lg:6,xl:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`stat-card fade-in`,style:{animationDelay:`${index*0.1}s`},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-title",children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`stat-icon ${card.iconClass}`,children:card.icon})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:loading?'--':card.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`stat-subtitle ${card.trend==='up'?'positive':card.trend==='down'?'negative':'neutral'}`,children:loading?'Âä†ËΩΩ‰∏≠...':/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[card.trend==='up'&&'‚Üó ',card.trend==='down'&&'‚Üò ',card.trend==='neutral'&&'üìÖ ',card.subtitle]})})]})},index))});};export default StatsCards;
